casebody.data:
William Nelson Cromwell, as Assignee, etc., Respondent v. William F. Black, Appellant. Decided November 10, 1891. Appeal from order .denying defendant’s motion for a further bill of particulars. Eugene D. Hawkins, for appellant. William J. Curtis, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Dugro, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements.
